questions.title: How many years of experience do you have as a developer?
questions.answer: Combining professional experience with voluntary projects, I have 3 years of experience as a developer.

questions.title: How many years of experience do you have in cybersecurity?
questions.answer: Currently, I do not have professional experience in the field of cybersecurity beyond reviews and tests performed on my own code.

questions.title: What salary range are you willing to work in?
questions.answer: If the job is as a developer, we could range from 22K to 25K. In the case of cybersecurity, since I am just starting out, the range would be from 20K to 22K.

questions.title: What do you like most about this job?
questions.answer: I love being able to learn new things and create from scratch, as well as analyzing old projects and understanding their workings. Another thing I like about this job is the constant need to stay updated, which presents ongoing challenges for me.

questions.title: Hobbies outside of work?
questions.answer: I am passionate about what I do, so I usually spend time working on personal projects or conducting small tests with technologies that catch my eye. I'm also a big sports fan and often go to the gym.
